channel.title: Remakes of OMFG & Curbi!
channel.description:
Hello guys !
I just realized that nobody made remakes of existing songs. So, I made some (only by earing) with free packs so anybody can play with them.
OMFG - Dying https://app.auxy.co/projects/Mz80l59BTzmYKFLUFbr0Cg== Not finished, copy the chords, the Puppy and the Bow of I Love You if you want
OMFG - I Love You https://app.auxy.co/projects/UHhWLwtfWTmA3huwmUVixw== Complete !
Curbi & Fox Stevenson - Hoohah https://app.auxy.co/projects/ftPfLMm9LsN4SP8A8l4L4w== WARNING don’t put all the instruments together for this song

item.title: Remakes of OMFG & Curbi!
item.dc:creator: NEWNAMES
item.description:
For example @Eswyn made a remake of deadmau5 The Veldt.

Remix any track and post it here

I’ve always been a huge Deadmau5 fan, and throughout all of my music writing on my computer and auxy, I am inspired by his work. One song I really like is The Veldt, so I decided to do a short cover of it (actual song is 8 minutes). I did the tune of the vocals, and I think the final result was pretty great! If you want to check it out here’s the Auxy link: https://app.auxy.co/projects/WLs2IdNNCk9CDBBxK9bxmw==

And @anon41616463 remade Animals by Martin Garrix (original pack only btw).

Remix any track and post it here

I know some people like Martin Garrix, so I sort of remade his track Animals. Some of the elements in the track I couldn’t add, for instance the fill to the drop (motherf***ing animals) or the clock ticking effect. I did it all by ear, so some of the risers might be off lol

https://app.auxy.co/projects/ehoAzlDjX1RhxN2yWEYMBg==

Read full topic
